product_name: Werner Soul M Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: At home surfing, charging downwind or touring, the Werner Soul Stand Up Paddle features a medium-size fiberglass blade for versatile power and a lightweight carbon-fiber blade. Suitable for multiple paddlers of different heights, the Werner Soul Adjustable Stand up paddle telescopes to fit 3 size ranges: 70 - 77.5 in, 74 - 81.5 in and 80 - 87.5 in. Progressive midsize rectangular blade fits the widest range of paddlers and takes it easy on your joints with a gentle catch. Carbon-fiber shaft offers an exceptionally light, buoyant and quiet feel on the water, and fiberglass laminate blade provides lightweight power. Smooth back face allows for a quieter catch and effortless exit of the stroke. Dynel(R) edges protect the paddle from the rigors of all around SUP use. 7deg angle offers great forward stroke while freeing the blade from catching while surfing. Durable, T-shape ABS palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: At home surfing, charging downwind or touring, the Werner Soul Stand Up Paddle features a medium-size fiberglass blade for versatile power and a lightweight carbon-fiber blade.
